name: Divinity Fatum
description:
Semi-horror, psychological adventure game, where as game's protagonist we search for clues explaining where is she and most important - who, or rather what is she.

Game contains lot's of wandering in it's fist act. If you're familiar with games such as Yume Nikki and you enjoy this kind of entertainment, this game may suit your tastes as well.

In current demo version, game almost completely covers 2 out of 3 acts. There are 2 possible endings to get (however without cutscenes implemented yet) as well as small prelude to act 3.

Graphics were done from scratch by me, so you may expect something different.

Game contains few disturbing scenes and at times graphics depicting mild nudity, so play if you can stand things as such.
